name: Stealth Kill VR Test Build
description:
Stealth Kill VR is an VR Game inspired by Metal Gear Solid VR Missions

The objective is to complete various "Training" Missions in a VR Environment.

The Game is still very early in development, but I'm constantly improving on it.
If you want to get a behind-the-scenes view of the development, help shape the game or get access to additional test builds, then join my Discord Server:
https://discord.gg/uCm6d3HDxq

This Test Build includes 8 sneaking missions, see if you can complete them all.

The game will start in a main menu scene that includes various items to test out. 

* Try to grab knife and stab dummy targets 
 * Try to grab magazine and throw it against wall to make a sound
* Try to make a grip gesture and knock on the walls to make a sound (Knock twice to lure live guards)

When ready, press trigger on the Start Mission button at the middle of the level.

Try it out and let me know what you think!

Please note: I'm developing this Project using Valve Index. If you have another VR Headset/Controller and the game interactions doesn't work, let me know in my discord server and I'll add bindings.

Known Bugs:
- If you stand up while walking through a tunnel, you'll be teleport on top of the tunnel, locking your movement.
